name: Pinky Blue Eyes
description:
Act I - Help Pinky find his lost sibling Reddy.

Only Act I is completed at this time.

Controls

A = Z 

B = X 

Select = Shift

Start = Enter

Plans for Act II - Switch from playing as either Pinky or Reddy. New areas to explore. New characters to meet. Also, Kelly might die? Stay tuned!

Art Assets Used

  • Pixel Pete's Art Assets (Grass, Flowers)
  • Gameboy Tileset by ArMM1998 (Fountain, Brick Paths)
  • GameBoy Style Dark Forest Tileset (Dead Trees)

Made in GB Studio
